thread.title: Celebrate the True Meaning of Christmas With...
thread.title_full: Celebrate the True Meaning of Christmas With...

title: Celebrate the True Meaning of Christmas With...
text:
True Meaning of Christmas Poems Christmas Poems About the Gift of Jesus Christ By Brian K. Walters and Cheryl White Updated November 09, 2016 . 
The true meaning of Christmas often gets lost in the rush of the season: the shopping, the parties, the baking, and the wrapping of presents. But the essence of the season is the greatest gift of all timeâ€”God gave us Jesus Christ , his Son, who brings great joy to everyone who receives him. The purpose of Christmas is to share this gift so the whole world will know the love of our Savior. 
"The True Meaning of Christmas" poem was written by Brian K. Walters. Let this meditation help you focus on celebrating the birth of Jesus the Savior : The True Meaning of Christmas Poem 
In today's day and time,It's easy to lose sight,Of the true meaning of Christmas
